description:
The stirling engine is the second tier of engine provided by Buildcraft. By feeding it a constant supply of combustible material (i.e., whatever a furnace can accept), it will yield a steady 10 RF/t. Various materials will keep the engine running for more or less time:

| Material      | Time (m:s)|
|---------------|----------:|
| Lava Bucket   |     20:40 |
| Coal/Charcoal |      1:20 |
| Wood/Planks   |      0:15 |
| Sapling/Stick |      0:05 |
